Fits Command Line

Module to extract FITS info quickly from the command line

A command line utlity to display various parameters of a FITS file and to browse through them.

class cmdfits.FITSViewer(fits_files)

Class to display a broswer for FITS files

next_image(event)

Function to go the next image

Parameters:

event – Click event

prev_image(event)

Function to go the previous image

Parameters:

event – Click event

cmdfits.display_header_info(fits_files, attributes)

Displays header info about the FITS file.

Parameters:

  • fits_files – Take a single or a list of FITS files as input

  • attributes – Command line attributes passed via argparse
